p: Even before the COVID-19 vaccine is found, national leaders are faced with the dilemma of whether to immunize as much of the population as possible or whether compulsory vaccination carries the risk of movement, which is already prone to conspiracy theories about pharmaceutical companies and government authoritarian tendencies? Preliminary results from a study conducted by the Vaccine Confidence Project and ORB International, in Europe in early April, 2020, while the infection was still on the rise, show that resistance to the vaccine is particularly strong in countries that have managed to avoid the worst pandemic ( 2, 23- 25).
